backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing scam report submission, storage, user queries, and scam-type statistics.
feature_evidence.json: JSON report describing implemented export‑related features, associated files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: List of frontend file paths with brief descriptions of each component, page, hook, and script.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variable definitions for light/dark modes using OKLCH color tokens.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell loading the React app via main.tsx into the root div.
frontend/scripts/EXPORT_ARTIFACT.md: Documentation describing export archive contents, formats, locations, and verification steps.
frontend/scripts/export-source-code.ps1: PowerShell script creating a ZIP archive of the full project including backend, frontend, and config files.
frontend/scripts/export-source-code.sh: Shell script creating a tar.gz archive of the full project including backend, frontend, and config files.
frontend/SOURCE_CODE_EXPORT.md: Guide explaining prerequisites, export steps, local setup, running the app, structure, and troubleshooting.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with all app routes wrapped in AppLayout.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Layout wrapper providing navigation, main content area, and footer with Caffeine attribution.
frontend/src/components/AppNav.tsx: Responsive navigation header with desktop buttons and a mobile slide-out menu using router state to highlight active links.
frontend/src/components/Branding.tsx: Provides logo components including a standalone image and a combined logo-wordmark layout.
frontend/src/components/ReportsDashboard: Fetches and displays scam reporting statistics with loading and error states, including most common scam info.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity authentication context, loading identities, handling login flow, and exposing identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines hooks for fetching stats and submitting scam reports using the backend actor with React Query.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind layers and custom CSS variables for light/dark themes and global styles.
frontend/src/lib/riskDetector.ts: Analyzes text for risk keywords to classify offers into low, medium, or high risk with explanations.
frontend/src/lib/riskQuiz.ts: Contains quiz questions and scoring logic to evaluate subscription-trap awareness and produce risk levels with explanations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with query client and Internet Identity provider wrappers.
frontend/src/pages/BrowserExtensionConce: Static concept page describing a proposed browser extension with mockups and feature explanations.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page with hero section, CTAs, and examples of common dark patterns.
frontend/src/pages/PersonalDigitalRiskTe: Interactive quiz page that calculates a digital vulnerability score and shows personalized tips.
frontend/src/pages/ScamReportingPage.tsx: Form page for submitting scam reports with success/error handling and a dashboard view.
frontend/src/pages/SubscriptionTrapDetec: Tool page allowing users to paste offer text and receive automated subscription‑trap risk analysis.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme colors, fonts, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, architecture notes, and a list of defined features for the DarkPattern Shield prototype. Contains no code, only structured project planning data.
